Reader:    Gemalto USB GemPCPinpad SmartCard Reader 00 00
IdVendor:  0x08E6
IdProduct: 0x3478
[2, 16, 0, 7, 255, 4, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 16, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0]
LogicalLCDLineNumber (Logical number of LCD lines): 2
LogicalLCDRowNumber (Logical number of characters per LCD line): 16
LcdInfo: 0
  b0 indicates if scrolling available: False
EntryValidationCondition: 7
PC/SCv2 features:
 VerifyPinStart: True
 VerifyPinFinish: True
 ModifyPinStart: True
 ModifyPinFinish: True
 GetKeyPressed: True
 VerifyPinDirect: True
 ModifyPinDirect: True
 Abort: True
 GetKey: False
 WriteDisplay: False
 SetSpeMessage: True
 bTimeOut2: False
 bListSupportedLanguages: False
 bNumberMessageFix: False
 bPPDUSupportOverXferBlock: False
 bPPDUSupportOverEscape: False
VersionNumber: 1
MinimumPINSize: 1
MaximumPINSize: 16
Firewall: False
